TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_puqing_tayal, title = puqing_tayal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/puqing_tayal} }

S.FORM: puqing tayal ga t'aring squ Pinsbkan Papakwaqa kwara kawas nya qa maki payat seng kawas ma cyux qutux krahu balay tunux maki sa babaw Papakwaqa maki qutux ryax, mhutaw lhzyal tunux qani ru bka tunux qani la, kahul zik tunux qani qa, mhtuw sazing mlikuy ru qutux kneril ana ga qutux mlikuy sazing nha qa msyax iyal wagi roziq nya, yasa ini soya maki tanux tunux qani, wa si usa zik tunux la, thay qu qutux mlikuy ru qutux kneril qani la, nha sazing hi qa puqing ni Atayal balay.

poqing tayal ga t'aring sqo Pinsbkan Papakwaqa kwara kawas nya qa maki payat seng kawas ma cyox qotox kraho balay tonox maki sa babaw Papakwaqa maki qotox ryax, mhotaw lhzyal tonox qani ro bka tonox qani la, kahol zik tonox qani qa, mhtow sazing mlikoy ro qotox kneril ana ga qotox mlikoy sazing nha qa msyax iyal wagi roziq nya, yasa ini soya maki tanox tonox qani, wa si osa zik tonox la, thay qo qotox mlikoy ro qotox kneril qani la, nha sazing hi qa poqing ni Atayal balay.
